## Type of Change

- [ ] **Bug fix** - Non-breaking change that fixes an issue
- [ ] **Feature** - Non-breaking change that adds functionality
- [ ] **Breaking change** - Fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change
- [ ] **Refactor** - Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
- [ ] **Documentation** - Changes to documentation only
- [ ] **Performance** - Changes that improve performance
- [ ] **Tests** - Adding or updating tests

## Pre-Merge Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No unnecessary print/debug statements

### Testing

- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Existing tests still pass
- [ ] Edge cases considered

### Security

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or API keys
- [ ] No sensitive data in logs
- [ ] Database credentials use environment variables

### Documentation

- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Docstrings added/updated
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)

### Data Pipeline (if applicable)

- [ ] Feature count unchanged (XL: 102, V3: 136) or documented
- [ ] No data leakage introduced
- [ ] Database schema changes documented
- [ ] Backward compatible with existing models

## Model Impact (if applicable)

- [ ] **No model impact** - Changes don't affect training or inference
- [ ] **Retraining required** - Models need to be retrained
- [ ] **Feature change** - Feature engineering modified
